alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Bath; Botetourt (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alleghany, southwestern Bath and northwestern Botetourt Counties in west central Virginia and the City of Covington through 245 PM EDT... At 220 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Covington, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington... Clifton Forge... Iron Gate... Low Moor... Carloover... Natural Well... and Selma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
